sense.gloss: to go, to come, to call
to be defeated, to collapse, to die
to be annoyed, to be nonplussed

sdata.j: お↑墓↑↓はか↓に|↑参↑↓まい↓る|↑時↑↓とき↓は、お↑線香↑↓せんこう↓とろうそく、それからお↑花↑↓はな↓を↑忘↑↓わす↓れずに↑持↑↓も↓っててね。
sdata.e: When you go visit the grave, don't forget to bring incense and candles, oh, and flowers too.

sdata.j: ↑暑↑↓あつ↓いの↑苦手↑↓にがて↓なんで、この↑暑↑↓あつ↓さにはほんと|↑参↑↓まい↓る|わぁ。
sdata.e: I don't like hot weather, so this heat's really getting to me.
